long_desc: This course is offered only at Carnegie Mellons campus in Qatar.  This course, dealing with a significant historical question of the past century, will enable students to develop a deeper understanding of the origins of many contemporary states as well as problems in former colonies. Participants will work individually or in teams on research papers pertaining to their chosen countries.
name: Comparative Study of Nationalism Case Studies: USA, Arabia, South Africa
base_name: Comparative Study of Nationalism Case Studies: USA, Arabia, South Africa
